= Title property =

*Project:* [MessageDialogComponents Message Dialog Components].

*Unit:* _PJMessageDialog_.

*Class:* _[TPJVCLMsgDlg TPJVCLMsgDlg]_

{{{
type
  TCaption = type string;

property Title: TCaption;
}}}

== Description ==

Set this property to customise the string that is displayed as the dialog box window title. Leaving this property empty causes a default title to be displayed that depends on the value of the _[TPJVCLMsgDlgKind Kind]_ property.
